mapper.select: /* InspManageMapper.xml selectInspNmList */ SELECT DISTINCT INSP_NM FROM TB_INSP_MAS TIM WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY INSP_NM
mapper.insert: /* InspManageMapper.xml insertInspAssetList */ INSERT INTO TB_INSP_ASET ( INSP_NO , ASET_NO , ASET_NM , ASET_TYPE1 , ASET_TYPE2 , ASET_TYPE3 , MFTCO , MODEL , SN , DEPT_CD , CHRGR , BSPLC , BULD , FLOOR , LOC , INSP_DT , INSP_STUS , INSP_MTD , INSP_CMPL_YN , REGR , REG_DT ) SELECT #{inspNo} INSP_NO , ASET_NO , ASET_NM , ASET_TYPE1 , ASET_TYPE2 , ASET_TYPE3 , MFTCO , MODEL , SN , DEPT_CD , CHRGR , BSPLC , BULD , FLOOR , LOC , (SELECT INSP_ST_DT FROM TB_INSP_MAS TIM WHERE TIM.INSP_NO = #{inspNo}) , 'NL' , 'WEB' , 'N' , #{regr} , NOW() FROM TB_ASET_MAS TAM WHERE ASET_NO = #{asetNo} ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE UPDR = #{regr} , UP_DT = NOW()
mapper.select: /* InspManageMapper.xml selectCountInspMngList */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_DEPT TD LEFT JOIN TB_INSP_MNG TIM ON TD.DEPT_CD = TIM.DEPT_CD AND TIM.INSP_NO = #{params.inspNo} WHERE TD.UPP_DEPT_CD IS NOT NULL AND CHAR_LENGTH(TD.DEPT_CD)=9 ORDER BY TD.LOC

/* InspManageMapper.xml selectInspMngList */ SELECT TD.UPP_DEPT_CD , (SELECT UTD.DEPT_NM FROM TB_DEPT UTD WHERE UTD.DEPT_CD = TD.UPP_DEPT_CD) UPP_DEPT_NM , TD.DEPT_CD , TD.DEPT_NM , (SELECT MAX(USER_ID) FROM TB_USER UTU WHERE UTU.DEPT_CD = TD.DEPT_CD AND CLPST = (SELECT MIN(TU.CLPST) FROM TB_USER TU WHERE TU.DEPT_CD = TD.DEPT_CD)) DPLDR , TIM.INSP_NO , TIM.INSPTR1 , TIM.INSPTR2 , TIM.INSPTR3 , TIM.INSPTR4 , TIM.INSPTR5 , TIM.REGR , TIM.REG_DT FROM TB_DEPT TD LEFT JOIN TB_INSP_MNG TIM ON TD.DEPT_CD = TIM.DEPT_CD AND TIM.INSP_NO = #{params.inspNo} WHERE TD.UPP_DEPT_CD IS NOT NULL AND CHAR_LENGTH(TD.DEPT_CD)=9 ORDER BY TD.LOC

/* InspManageMapper.xml selectInspProgressList */ SELECT UTIA.INSP_NO /* 실사번호 */ , UTIA.UPP_DEPT_CD /* 사업부 */ , UTIA.UPP_DEPT_NM /* 사업부명 */ , UTIA.DEPT_CD /* 부서 */ , UTIA.DEPT_NM /* 부서명 */ , UTIA.DPLDR /* 부서장 */ , UTIA.INSP_TARGET_CNT /* 실사대상 자산수 */ , UTIA.INSP_CMPL_CNT /* 실사완료 자산수 */ , CASE WHEN UTIA.INSP_TARGET_CNT = 0 THEN 0 ELSE FORMAT(UTIA.INSP_CMPL_CNT / UTIA.INSP_TARGET_CNT * 100 , 1) END INSP_PROGRESS_RATE /* 실사진행율 */ , UTIA.PAYMENT_YN /* 결제여부 */ FROM ( SELECT TIA.INSP_NO , (SELECT UPP_DEPT_CD FROM TB_DEPT TD WHERE TD.DEPT_CD = TIA.DEPT_CD) UPP_DEPT_CD , (SELECT DEPT_NM FROM TB_DEPT UTD WHERE UTD.DEPT_CD = (SELECT UPP_DEPT_CD FROM TB_DEPT TD WHERE TD.DEPT_CD = TIA.DEPT_CD)) UPP_DEPT_NM , TIA.DEPT_CD , (SELECT DEPT_NM FROM TB_DEPT TD WHERE TD.DEPT_CD = TIA.DEPT_CD) DEPT_NM , TIA.DPLDR , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_INSP_ASET TIS WHERE TIS.INSP_NO = TIA.INSP_NO AND TIS.DEPT_CD = TIA.DEPT_CD) INSP_TARGET_CNT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_INSP_ASET TIS WHERE TIS.INSP_NO = TIA.INSP_NO AND TIS.DEPT_CD = TIA.DEPT_CD AND TIS.INSP_CMPL_YN = 'Y') INSP_CMPL_CNT , '' PAYMENT_YN FROM TB_INSP_MNG TIA WHERE INSP_NO = #{params.inspNo} ) UTIA ORDER BY UTIA.DEPT_CD
